data.description:
## Problem
We added a global filterwarnings exception in pyproject.toml to prevent CI failures:

```toml
"ignore:GoTProjectManager uses the legacy event-sourced backend:DeprecationWarning",
```

This masks the deprecation warning, preventing us from treating warnings as errors for this case.

## Root Cause
Tests intentionally use GoTProjectManager for regression testing of the legacy backend.
Until GoTProjectManager is removed, we need this exception.

## Solution
After completing T-20251222-145525-445df343 (Remove deprecated EventLog and GoTProjectManager):

1. Remove the filterwarnings exception from pyproject.toml line 111-112
2. Delete or update any remaining tests that use GoTProjectManager
3. Verify CI passes with warnings-as-errors for all code

## Files to Modify
- pyproject.toml: Remove the ignore line for GoTProjectManager deprecation

## Dependency
Blocked by: T-20251222-145525-445df343 (Remove deprecated EventLog and GoTProjectManager classes)

## Verification
After removal, run:
```bash
python -m pytest tests/ -W error
```
Should pass without any deprecation warning exceptions needed for GoT code.
data.title: Remove filterwarnings exception after GoTProjectManager cleanup
